title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4038.15 - Intimidation, collusion
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4038.15 - Intimidation, collusion

State Regulations

Any person who shall attempt to prevent another person
from claiming any horse in a claiming race, or any owners running in claiming
races who may make any agreement for the claiming of each other's horses, may
be sanctioned by the stewards or the stewards may refer the matter to the
commission for further action. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4038.15

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 52, eff. 12/28/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
